definition: زرع zara‘a a (zar‘) to sow (هـ s.th.); to spread, scatter (هـ s.th.); to plant, raise, grow (هـ plants); to till, cultivate (الأرض al-arḍa land); to lay (لغما lugman mine) VII pass. of I; VIII ازدرع izdara‘a to sow زرع sowing; (pl. زروع zurū‘) seed; young standing crop, green crop; plantation; field(s) │ الزرع والضرع (ḍar‘) agriculture and stock farming
